titles.title: FBI Act of 2007
Full-Strength Bureau Initiative Act of 2007
A bill to bring the FBI to full strength to carry out its mission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/8/2007--Introduced.
Full-Strength Bureau Initiative Act of 2007 or the FBI Act of 2007 - Authorizes appropriations for FY2008-FY2012 to fund 1,000 additional Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) field agents.
